cards.name: Incineration
cards.description:
Deal 8 Damage. Add 3 (4) stuffthespire:Flame_Bursts into you hand.
stuffthespire:Decreasing 1.

cards.name: Rock Throw
cards.description:
Deal 4 Damage. Draw 1 card.
If this card is exhausted add a (2) copy (copies) of this card to your hand next turn. It (They) costs (cost) 0 for the rest of combat.

cards.name: Slingshot
cards.description: Exhaust a card. Deal 4 Damage. Apply 1 (2) Vulnerable.

cards.name: Blood Clot
cards.description:
Gain 6 (8) temporary HP when you loose health from a card next time.
stuffthespire:Decreasing 1.

cards.name: Pyroclast
cards.description:
Deal 1 Damage to all enemies 4 (5) times.
Add a Burn into your hand.
stuffthespire:Decreasing 1.

cards.name: Raging Bull
cards.description: Deal 14 Damage. Gain 2 Dexterity. After you play 5 (7) more cards loose 2 Dexterity.

cards.name: Resist
cards.description: Whenever you exhaust a status, gain 2 temporary HP. (Add 2 stuffthespire:Flame_Bursts into your hand.)

cards.name: Titan Form
cards.description: Gain 4 (6) stuffthespire:Dark_Fade. At the end of each turn loose 1 Strength.

cards.name: Bump Up
cards.description: Deal 10 Damage. Increase the Damage of all of your 2 cost cards by 20 (40) %.

cards.name: Cluster Crunch
cards.description: Discard all Attacks. Deal damage equal to 3 (4) times their total cost to all enemies.

cards.name: Injection
cards.description:
Deal 3 Damage.
If the target isn't poisoned, apply 7 (10) Poison.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Python
cards.description:
Apply 4 (6) stuffthespire:Constricted.
stuffthespire:Decreasing 1

cards.name: Brimstone Blast
cards.description:
Deal 5 (7) damage and apply 4 (6) Poison to all enemies.
Add a Burn to your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Double Shiv
cards.description:
Add 2  (upgraded) Shivs into your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Fury
cards.description:
~~- Draw -~~  ~~- 2 cards. -~~
Discard all non-Attack cards. (Draw 2 cards.)

cards.name: Incantation
cards.description:
Unplayable. ~~- stuffthespire:Fragile. -~~
When drawn gain 1 Strength.
Ethereal.

cards.name: Incursion
cards.description:
Gain 2 stuffthespire:Dark_Fade. When you loose HP, loose twice as much for 2 (1) turns (turn).
Exhaust.

cards.name: Mirror Stance
cards.description:
The first card you play next turn is played twice.
~~- Exhaust. -~~

cards.name: ReptileScales
cards.description:
Gain 2 (3) Plated Armor.
Gain 1 Block.
stuffthespire:Decreasing 1.

cards.name: Repulse
cards.description: Gain 12 (14) Block. Draw 1 (2) card (cards) for every enemy that intends to attack.

cards.name: Shiver
cards.description:
Gain 1 Strength.
Discard a card.
Add 1 (2) Shiv (Shivs) to your hand.
Apply 1 Weak to yourself and all enemies.

cards.name: Sprint
cards.description: Gain 14 Block. Increase the Block of a random card in your hand by 2 (4).

cards.name: Final Struggle
cards.description: Deal 2 damage and lose 5 (4) HP until the target has died. Heal all Hp lost from this card at the end of combat.

cards.name: Overload
cards.description:
Loose 1 Focus.
Channel 1 (2) Lightning. Next turn add a copy of stuffthespire:Discharge to your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Plug'n'play
cards.description: Channel 1 Lightning. Add a ~~- random  -~~ power from your draw pile into your hand.

cards.name: Clean Hard Drive
cards.description:
Exhaust 3 (4) cards from your draw pile.
stuffthespire:Decreasing 1.

cards.name: Cold Hearted
cards.description: Channel 1 Frost. Gain 3 (5) temporary HP.

cards.name: Glass Shard
cards.description:
stuffthespire:Fragile.
Deal 10 (14) Damage.
Apply 2 (1) Frail to yourself.

cards.name: Nuclear Reactor
cards.description:
Costs [E] less for every Frost you evoked this turn.
Channel 2 Plasma.
Apply 6 (9) Poison to all enemies.

cards.name: Rend
cards.description: Claw cards apply 1 Vulnerable this turn. Draw 1 card.

cards.name: Shield Generator
cards.description:
Unplayable.
Can be upgraded any number of times.
Startup: Gain 3 (4) (6) (9) (13) (18) (24) (31) (39) (48) temporary HP

cards.name: Snap Shoot
cards.description:
If you have at least 3 orbs channeled, permanently add a (an)  (upgraded) stuffthespire:Snapshot that channels your 3 front most orbs to your deck.
Fleeting.

cards.name: Synthwave
cards.description: Lightning triggers it's passive an additional time.

cards.name: Event Horizon
cards.description:
Can only be played when you have at least 3 Dark channelled.
Gain 3 (4) stuffthespire:Dark_Fade.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Launching Strike
cards.description:
Deal 16 (20) Damage.
Apply stuffthespire:Flight.
When the target loses stuffthespire:Flight, deal 16 (20) Damage again.

cards.name: Purify
cards.description: Replace all Dark with Plasma. Draw 1 (2) card (cards) for every Dark replaced.

cards.name: foreach(){}
cards.description:
Trigger the passive ability of all of your orbs 2 (3) times.
stuffthespire:Decreasing 1.

cards.name: Deluminance
cards.description:
Gain 1 (2) stuffthespire:Dark_Fade.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Discharge
cards.description:
Evoke all of your orbs twice.
Gain 1 (2) Focus.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Flame Burst
cards.description:
Ethereal.
Deal 1 Damage to all enemies when this card exhausts.

cards.name: Free Real Estate
cards.description:
stuffthespire:Unique.
Gain 5 (7) Gold. Draw 1 card.
stuffthespire:Decreasing 1.

cards.name: Plasma Pulse
cards.description:
Gain 1 Block 3 (4) times. Draw 1 card.
stuffthespire:Decreasing 1.

cards.name: Plasma Punch
cards.description:
Deal 1 Damage 4 (5) times. Draw 1 card.
stuffthespire:Decreasing 1.

cards.name: Recharge
cards.description:
stuffthespire:Unique.
stuffthespire:Recharge 3 (4).
Purge.

cards.name: Curious Curse
cards.description:
Unplayable.
Startup: Add a random Curse to your draw pile.
Ethereal.

cards.name: War
cards.description:
At the end of your turn take 8 damage.
Fleeting.

cards.name: You've been GNOMED!
cards.description:
When drawn lose 1 Strength.
Ethereal.

cards.name: Ambrosia
cards.description:
Unplayable.
Startup: gain 1 (2) max. HP.

cards.name: Brainwave
cards.description:
Unplayable.
Startup: Reduce the cost of 4 (5) cards in your draw pile to 0 this combat.
Ethereal.

cards.name: Brawn
cards.description:
Unplayable.
stuffthespire:Fragile.
When drawn gain 4 Strength for one turn and add a (an) ~~- random  -~~ attack from your draw pile to your hand.

cards.name: Celestial Warden
cards.description:
Gain 6 (9) Block.
Gain 3 (4) stuffthespire:Warding.
Gain 3 (4) Plated Armor.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Copia of Famine
cards.description:
Unplayable.
 (When this card is exhausted, a random enemy looses 4 Strength.)
Startup: A random enemy loses 4 Strength.
Ethereal.

cards.name: Death Note
cards.description: Unplayable. On turn 10 deal 200 damage to a (all) random enemy (enemies). When drawn, draw 1 card. Current turn: 1

cards.name: Harmony
cards.description:
Unplayable.
Startup: Gain 1 Regeneration for every 4 (3) Skills in your draw pile.

cards.name: Innocence
cards.description:
Unplayable.
stuffthespire:Fragile.
When drawn gain 1 Intangible (and don't loose your Block at the start of your next turn).

cards.name: Perfection
cards.description:
Unplayable (Fleeting).
~~- Upon pickup, upgrade 3 random cards. -~~

cards.name: Pest Control
cards.description:
Unplayable.
Startup: Apply 12 poison to a (all) random enemy (enemies)

cards.name: Rapture
cards.description:
Unplayable.
stuffthespire:Fragile.
When drawn, draw 3 (4) cards and gain [E] .

cards.name: Vigor
cards.description:
Unplayable.
If you play a card while this is in your hand gain 3 (4) temporary HP.
Ethereal.

cards.name: War Groove
cards.description:
Gain 7 Strength. Lose 1 Strength at the end of the next 7 turns.
~~- Add a stuffthespire:Curse_of_War to your Deck. -~~
Exhaust.

relics.name: Barrel
relics.description: If you have 50 or less gold at the end of combat, heal 8 HP.
relics.flavorText: "Money does not buy you happiness, therefore imma sit in this barrel now" - Greek Philosophy Man

relics.name: Experiment 12
relics.description: Whenever you play a card that costs 2 or more gain 2 temporary HP.
relics.flavorText: Would you like some beer with your clichee?

relics.name: Grape Vine
relics.description: Every third Attack you play applies 2 stuffthespire:constricted.
relics.flavorText: In vino veritas

relics.name: Gunfinga
relics.description: At the start of each turn gain 3 Strength until the end of the turn or until you play an Attack.
relics.flavorText: It's a bad man signal

relics.name: Mouthbags
relics.description: Upon Pickup choose a card and increase it's damage and Block by 4.
relics.flavorText: The better alternative to Ravioli.

relics.name: Rolling Stone
relics.description: At the start of each turn gain 3 Dexterity until the end of the turn or until you play a skill.
relics.flavorText: Sisyphos was here

relics.name: The old fever
relics.description: At the start of your turn, if your discard pile is larger than your draw pile, discard a card and add a card from your discard pile to your hand.
relics.flavorText: And again and again, it's the same old songs.

relics.name: Tinted Rock
relics.description: Gain 300% more gold from elite combats.
relics.flavorText: Don't miss it!

relics.name: Withered Skull
relics.description: While below 50% of your max. HP apply 3 Poison to all enemies at the end of your turn.
relics.flavorText: They are so rare

relics.name: Coconut
relics.description: Upon Pickup gain 5 max HP. At the start of each combat gain 3 stuffthespire:Juggernaut.
relics.flavorText: If you eat to much you'll get very fat.

relics.name: Cold Mirror
relics.description: The first time you evoke an Orb each combat, channel 1 Frost.
relics.flavorText: You need at least seven brains to understand this.

relics.name: Emerald Signet
relics.description: Heal 2 Hp whenever Weak is applied to you.
relics.flavorText: The Emerald comes alive when you are poisoned to heal your wounds.

relics.name: Force Gauntlet
relics.description: Your attack damage is increased by 20%
relics.flavorText: Be gone!

relics.name: High Noon Tea
relics.description: For every twelve cards you play, reduce the cost of all Attacks in your hand by 1 for one turn.
relics.flavorText: Dedicated to HighOnTea

relics.name: Point Blank
relics.description: Attacks that target multiple enemies deal 50% more damage if only one enemy is in the room.
relics.flavorText: Not the evil one.

relics.name: Rhap's Scallions
relics.description: Upon pickup remove a card from your deck, then gain max. HP equal to 60 divided by your deck size.
relics.flavorText: Get it? Because, like, scallions are a vegetable?

relics.name: Ruby Signet
relics.description: Heal 2 Hp whenever Vulnerable is applied to you
relics.flavorText: The Ruby comes alive when you are burning to heal your wounds.

relics.name: Sapphire Signet
relics.description: Heal 2 Hp whenever Frail is applied to you.
relics.flavorText: The Sapphire comes alive when you are frozen to heal your wounds.

relics.name: Bottled HeartBeat
relics.description: Upon pickup choose a card that does not Exhaust on it's own. Whenever the card is exhausted, gain 2 max. HP
relics.flavorText: I I just... over you... a e can't get...

relics.name: Cup of Expresso
relics.description: At the start of each turn reduce the cost of one of the cheapest cards in you hand to 0 for one turn.
relics.flavorText: Made from delicious java code beans.

relics.name: Dark Steel Anvil
relics.description: Upgrades are more effective.
relics.flavorText: Made from steel infused with obsidian.

relics.name: Mayflowers
relics.description: Gain 3 Regeneration on turn 5
relics.flavorText: March winds and April showers...

relics.name: Neows Tribute
relics.description: Right Click during Combat: Consume 1 Charge to gain 1 Intangible. Defeat Elites to gain Charges.
relics.flavorText: It is said, that Neow rewards those who have achieved great things.

relics.name: Nightcore
relics.description: At the start of each combat gain 1 stuffthespire:Dark_fade.
relics.flavorText: Your eardrums are broken.

relics.name: Wild Fire
relics.description: Whenever you play 3 Attacks in one turn, add a Skill from your draw pile to your hand.
relics.flavorText: Get Mad

relics.name: Blackout Curse
relics.description: Deal 50% less attack damage.
relics.flavorText: Hello Darkness

relics.name: Broken Rose
relics.description: At the start of each turn gain 1 stuffthespire:Thorns.
relics.flavorText: Sah ein Knab ein Röslein stehn.

relics.name: Chain Archetype
relics.description: Additional card rewards for the Chain Archetype may now appear with a 33% chance.
relics.flavorText: Only the cool kids could draw those back in the day.

relics.name: Discard Archetype
relics.description: Additional card rewards for the Discard Archetype may now appear with a 33% chance.
relics.flavorText: Discarded and rejected. Not this time!

relics.name: Frost Archetype
relics.description: Additional card rewards for the Frost Archetype may now appear with a 33% chance.
relics.flavorText: You're as cold as ice!

relics.name: Greater Snecko Eye
relics.description: Whenever you play a card, randomize the cost of all other cards in your hand.
relics.flavorText: This one is even more confusing.

relics.name: Lightning Archetype
relics.description: Additional card rewards for the Lightning Archetype may now appear with a 33% chance.
relics.flavorText: THUNDER oaoaoaoAAAAAOA!

relics.name: Occult Apparatus
relics.description: Whenever you play 3 Skills in one turn, the next card you play is exhausted and a copy of it is added to your hand next turn.
relics.flavorText: The intricate gearbox keeps the gears spinning indefinitely, providing an infinite source of power.

relics.name: Shiv Archetype
relics.description: Additional card rewards for the Shiv Archetype may now appear with a 33% chance.
relics.flavorText: Stabby stab!

relics.name: Strike Archetype
relics.description: Additional card rewards for the Strike Archetype may now appear with a 33% chance.
relics.flavorText: Im struck.

relics.name: Modem D'Avis
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of each turn. You can't play more than 2 1 cost cards per turn.
relics.flavorText: Hallo. Ich bin Marcell D'Avis. Leiter für Kundenzufriedenheit bei 1&1!

relics.name: Paper Kängäröö
relics.description: At the start of each turn reduce all Buffs and Debuffs by 1 (Increase them if you have negative stacks). Whenever you gain a Buff, increase it by 2.
relics.flavorText: It's on my NotTodo™ list.

relics.name: Runic Confusion
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of each turn. You can no longer see Card descriptions and Costs.
relics.flavorText: Wat?

relics.name: Runic Hypercube
relics.description:
After the first turn of combat gain 3 [E] and draw 5 additional cards at the start of each turn.
At the end of your turn count the total cost of all cards in your hand.
Loose that much [E] and draw fewer cards equal to the total cost next turn.
relics.flavorText: It seems to shift in size and shape. Strange.

relics.name: Bottled Essence
relics.description: Cards that exhaust when played have exhaustive 2 instead.
relics.flavorText: For when a spoon is just not enough.

relics.name: Dull Razor
relics.description: At the start of each turn trigger the effects of all cards, relics and powers that have an effect when taking damage.
relics.flavorText: It hurts a little bit.

relics.name: FIXED Saxophone
relics.description: Whenever you obtain a curse, also obtain a blessing.
relics.flavorText: I was broken for long enough but now I am fixed!

relics.name: History Book
relics.description: Cards in your draw pile are now always sorted in the order they were added to your deck.
relics.flavorText: Your entire past and future is written down here

keywords.name: Curse of War
keywords.description: A 1 cost, fleeting curse that deals 8 damage to you at the end of your turn.

keywords.name: Dark Fade
keywords.description: While active, 75% of all HP lost by enemies during the turn is dealt as damage at the start of the next turn.

keywords.name: Flame Burst
keywords.description: An ethereal Status that deals 1 damage to all enemies when exhausted.

keywords.name: Flame Bursts
keywords.description: An ethereal Status that deals 1 damage to all enemies when exhausted.

keywords.name: Archetype
keywords.description:
When picked up, future reward screens may have an additional card reward for a specific archetype.
You can only have one Archetype active at once.

keywords.name: Constricted
keywords.description: At the end of each turn, the target takes damage equal to the amount of Constricted.

keywords.name: Decreasing
keywords.description: Decrease the orange Value for the rest of this Combat when playing this card.

keywords.name: Discharge
keywords.description: A Card that costs [E] and evokes all orbs twice and gives you one focus.

keywords.name: Flight
keywords.description:
All attack damage taken is reduced by 50%.
If the owner takes attack damage three times in one turn, Flight is removed.

keywords.name: Fragile
keywords.description: When you play another card while this is in your hand, this card exhausts.

keywords.name: Juggernaut
keywords.description: Whenever you gain block deal damage to a random enemy.

keywords.name: Linked
keywords.description: Can only be played by a Chain card.

keywords.name: Recharge
keywords.description: Increase the value of all decreasing cards in your hand.

keywords.name: Snapshot
keywords.description: A 3 cost card that channels 3 orbs. Upgrades to become 2 cost.

keywords.name: Thorns
keywords.description: Whenever you are attacked, the attacker takes damage equal to your thorns.

keywords.name: Unique
keywords.description: If you attempt to copy this card during combat, obtain a copy of Dazed instead.

keywords.name: Warding
keywords.description: Take 25% less attack damage for 1 turn.

mods.name: Stuff the Spire
mods.credits: The Rapublic Discord for card ideas: LightningLord2.71828183 for the Rend and Clean hard drive card idea. Krasunir for the Purify card idea. WikkadGaming for too many ideas too name here, including blesssings. PurpleSmart & Gremlin Horn for the Harmony card idea.
mods.description: Adds new cards, relics, events and other stuff with partial GifTheSpireLib integration.
